title: Anti-Portal Block
summaries: The Anti-Portal Block is a Hardmode block that prevents portals made from the Portal Gun to form. This can be useful for map makers who want to make some places inaccessible by portals. They are purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 1 SC each.

statistics.Tooltip: Portals cannot be created on the surface of these blocks
statistics.Buy: 1 SC
statistics.Sell: 20 CC
